title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 153.2 - Payment of charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 153.2 - Payment of charges

State Regulations
A float owner or operator shall promptly pay to the Canal

Corporation all charges, fees and penalties in connection with the use of a
canal terminal or terminal facilities. In case of delay in payment of any
charge, fee or penalty, the Canal Corporation may withhold clearance for a
float or floats registered under the name of the defaulting
person. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
153.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
